verification.subject: {app_name} - Verify Your Email
verification.title: Welcome to {app_name}!
verification.intro: Thank you for registering! To complete your account setup, please verify your email address using the code below:
verification.expiry: This code will expire in {minutes} minutes.
verification.ignore: If you didn't create an account with {app_name}, please ignore this email.
verification.footer:
This is an automated email, please do not reply.

recovery.subject: {app_name} - Account Recovery
recovery.title: Account Recovery
recovery.intro: We received a request to recover your {app_name} account. Use the code below to proceed with account recovery:
recovery.expiry: This code will expire in {minutes} minutes.
recovery.warning: ⚠️ Security Notice: If you didn't request this recovery, please ignore this email and ensure your email account is secure.
recovery.footer:
This is an automated email, please do not reply.
© {year} {app_name}. All rights reserved.

twoFactorReset.subject: {app_name} - Two-Factor Authentication Reset
twoFactorReset.title: Security Alert
twoFactorReset.intro: Your two-factor authentication (2FA) has been successfully reset.
twoFactorReset.actionDescription: ✓ What was done: Your authenticator app has been disconnected and new backup codes have been generated.
twoFactorReset.instruction: Please set up your authenticator app again with the new QR code provided and save your new backup codes in a secure location.
twoFactorReset.warning: ⚠️ Security Notice: If you didn't perform this action, someone may have access to your account. Please contact support immediately.
twoFactorReset.footer:
This is an automated email, please do not reply.
© {year} {app_name}. All rights reserved.

deleteAccount.subject: {app_name} - Confirm Account Deletion
deleteAccount.title: Account Deletion Request
deleteAccount.intro: We received a request to permanently delete your {app_name} account. To confirm this action, please use the code below:
deleteAccount.expiry: This code will expire in {minutes} minutes.
deleteAccount.warning: ⚠️ Warning: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be erased.
deleteAccount.ignore: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email and change your password immediately.
deleteAccount.footer:
This is an automated email, please do not reply.
© {year} {app_name}. All rights reserved.
